# 39. Switch to apt-managed supervisor

**Date:** 2020-11-04

**Optional per env:** _required on all environments_


## CommCare Version Dependency
This change is not known to be dependent on any particular version of CommCare.


## Change Context
Install supervisor supplied by the apt package manager.

## Details
Security patches and updates will be more reliably managed with the
apt-managed version of supervisor.

## Steps to update
```sh
commcare-cloud <env> ansible-playbook deploy_commcarehq.yml --tags supervisor
```
